epic.title: Security & Compliance
epic.summary: Comprehensive security and compliance framework ensuring data protection, regulatory adherence, and continuous monitoring to safeguard patient information and meet healthcare industry standards.
epic.businessOverview: Comprehensive security and compliance framework ensuring data protection, regulatory adherence, and continuous monitoring to safeguard patient information and meet healthcare industry standards. The system implements multiple layers of security controls, maintains compliance with HIPAA, GDPR, and other regulations, and provides comprehensive audit and monitoring capabilities to protect sensitive healthcare data and maintain trust.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- Encryption service (AES-256, TLS 1.3)
- Key management system
- Web Application Firewall (WAF)
- DDoS protection infrastructure
- Vulnerability scanning tools
- SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) system
- Audit logging and monitoring platform
- Compliance management system
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Month 1:**
- Encryption implementation and key management

**Month 2:**
- Security infrastructure (WAF, DDoS protection)

**Month 3:**
- Compliance framework and certification preparation

**Month 4:**
- Audit logging and monitoring system

**Ongoing:**
- Regular vulnerability scanning and penetration testing
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Multi-State Healthcare Network**

- **Challenge:** Complex compliance requirements across multiple states, security vulnerabilities
- **Outcome:** SOC 2 Type II certified, zero security breaches, 100% HIPAA compliance

stories.title: AES-256 encryption for data at rest
stories.description: Implement AES-256 encryption for all data at rest to protect sensitive patient information stored in databases and file systems from unauthorized access.

stories.title: TLS 1.3 for all data transmission
stories.description: Use TLS 1.3 encryption for all data transmission to ensure secure communication between clients and servers and protect data in transit.

stories.title: Database encryption (transparent data encryption)
stories.description: Implement transparent data encryption (TDE) at the database level to automatically encrypt data without requiring application changes.

stories.title: Encrypted backups with separate key management
stories.description: Ensure all backups are encrypted using separate key management to protect backup data and maintain security even if backup media is compromised.

stories.title: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
stories.description: Deploy Web Application Firewall (WAF) to protect web applications from common attacks and vulnerabilities including SQL injection, XSS, and other OWASP Top 10 threats.

stories.title: DDoS protection (Cloudflare, AWS Shield)
stories.description: Implement DDoS protection using services like Cloudflare or AWS Shield to prevent distributed denial-of-service attacks and ensure service availability.

stories.title: Regular vulnerability scanning (weekly)
stories.description: Perform regular vulnerability scanning on a weekly basis to identify and remediate security vulnerabilities before they can be exploited.

stories.title: Annual penetration testing
stories.description: Conduct annual penetration testing by independent security experts to identify security weaknesses and validate security controls effectiveness.

stories.title: HIPAA compliance (administrative, physical, technical safeguards)
stories.description: Ensure full HIPAA compliance including administrative, physical, and technical safeguards to protect Protected Health Information (PHI) and meet regulatory requirements.

stories.title: HITECH Act breach notification capability
stories.description: Implement HITECH Act breach notification capability to detect breaches and notify affected individuals and authorities within required timeframes.

stories.title: GDPR compliance for European patients
stories.description: Ensure GDPR compliance for European patients including data protection, privacy rights, and cross-border data transfer requirements.

stories.title: SOC 2 Type II certification
stories.description: Obtain and maintain SOC 2 Type II certification to demonstrate comprehensive security controls and meet enterprise customer requirements.

stories.title: PCI DSS Level 1 for payment processing
stories.description: Maintain PCI DSS Level 1 compliance for payment processing to securely handle credit card transactions and meet payment card industry standards.

stories.title: State-specific privacy laws (CCPA, CPRA)
stories.description: Comply with state-specific privacy laws including CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act) and CPRA (California Privacy Rights Act) for California residents.

stories.title: ONC 2015 Edition certification (for meaningful use)
stories.description: Obtain ONC 2015 Edition certification to support meaningful use requirements and enable healthcare providers to meet CMS incentive program criteria.

stories.title: Comprehensive audit logging (who, what, when, where, why)
stories.description: Maintain comprehensive audit logging capturing who accessed what data, when, where, and why to support security monitoring and compliance requirements.

stories.title: Immutable audit trail (tamper-proof)
stories.description: Implement immutable audit trail that cannot be modified or deleted to ensure audit log integrity and support forensic investigations.

stories.title: Real-time security monitoring (SIEM integration)
stories.description: Integrate with SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) systems for real-time security monitoring and threat detection.

stories.title: Automated threat detection and response
stories.description: Implement automated threat detection and response capabilities to identify and respond to security threats in real-time without manual intervention.

stories.title: User behavior analytics (anomaly detection)
stories.description: Deploy user behavior analytics with anomaly detection to identify unusual access patterns and potential insider threats or compromised accounts.
